price: Onlar: “Bunu putlarımıza kim yaptıysa şüphesiz ki o zalimlerdendir” dediler.
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
